StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_rptRecruiterProduc.onReport]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN as varchar(9)
AS set nocount on
SELECT min(nwa_id) nwa_id INTO #tempRP FROM nwa GROUP BY marine_candidate_id
SELECT P.social_security_number, P..rst_name, P.last_name, P.legal_middle_name, P.Person_ID, NWA.comp_change_.ag, NWA.Marine_candidate_id mci, nwa.recruiter_of_record_id, nwa.organiza.on_of_record_id, C1.contract_begin_date, C1.discharge_date, C1.discharge_code, C1.nwa_id, C1.term_of_enlistment, C1.component_code, C1.contract_id
INTO #TempRecruitees
FROM Contract C1 inner join #tempRP on C1.nwa_id = #tempRP.nwa_id inner join NWA on C1.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID inner join Person P on P.PERSON_ID = NWA.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID
WHERE P.Social_Security_Number = @SSN
SELECT TRec.*, CE.educa.on_code, CE.educa.on_level, school_end_date, S.ship_date, TOrg.NAME AS SHIP_TO, RP.rank_code, RP.tour_begin_date, RP.tour_end_date, RT.Drop_Reason, RT.drop_date, CA.AFQT_Score, CA.Asvab_Date, P2.Social_Security_Number SSN, P2.last_name LN, P2..rst_name FN, P2.legal_middle_name MN, RO.MCC_Code, RO.Short_Name, MC.Gender_Code, MC.marine_candidate_id, QSN.QSN_ID, QSN.MOS, DRC.discharge_reason, DRRT.discharge_reason as mcrd_reason
INTO #TEMPj
FROM #TempRecruitees TRec le. outer join QSN on TRec.CONTRACT_ID = QSN.CONTRACT_ID le. outer join Discharge_Reason DRC on TRec.DISCHARGE_CODE = DRC.DISCHARGE_CODE le. outer join Shipper S on TRec.CONTRACT_ID = S.CONTRACT_ID le. outer join Recruit_Training RT on S.SHIP_ID = RT.SHIP_ID le. outer join Discharge_Reason DRRT on RT.DROP_REASON = DRRT.DISCHARGE_CODE le. outer join Training_Organiza.on TOrg on S.TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID = TOrg.TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID le. outer join Person P2 on TRec.mci = P2.PERSON_ID le. outer join Recrui.ng_Person RP on TRec.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID le. outer join Recrui.ng_Organiza.on RO on TRec.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID le. outer join Candidate_ASVAB CA on TRec.mci = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID le. outer join Marine_Candidate MC on TRec.mci = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID le. outer join Candidate_Educa.on CE on MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID
WHERE (
CE.rowguid = (select top 1 ce1.rowguid from candidate_educa.on ce1 where ce1.marine_candidate_id = ce.marine_candidate_id order by ce1.educa.on_level desc)
AND ((NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM contract C2 WHERE C2.nwa_id = TRec.nwa_id AND discharge_code = 'ZKC' AND C2.CONTRACT_ID < TRec.CONTRACT_ID)) AND ((TRec.DISCHARGE_CODE <> 'ZKC') OR (TRec.DISCHARGE_CODE IS NULL)))
-- get asvab record with the latest date AND (CA.ROWGUID =( SELECT top 1 rowguid FROM candidate_asvab CA1 WHERE CA1.marine_candidate_id = CA.marine_candidate_id and CA1.asvab_date = ( SELECT max(CA2.asvab_date) FROM candidate_asvab CA2 WHERE CA2.marine_candidate_id = CA1.marine_candidate_id) ) )
) -- end of where statement
SELECT CONTRACT_ID,PROGRAM_ID INTO #TEMPjj FROM program_availability WHERE CONTRACT_ID IN(SELECT CONTRACT_ID FROM #TEMPJ)
set nocount o.
SELECT J.*, ( SELECT TOP 1 P.PROGRAM_ID FROM #TEMPjj PA LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGRAM P ON PA.PROGRAM_ID=P.PROGRAM_ID WHERE pa.CONTRACT_ID = J.CONTRACT_ID )AS PROGid , ( SELECT TOP 1 P.Program_descrip.on FROM #TEMPjj PA LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGRAM P ON PA.PROGRAM_ID=P.PROGRAM_ID WHERE pa.CONTRACT_ID = J.CONTRACT_ID )AS PROG_DESC FROM #TEMPj j
set nocount on DROP TABLE #TEMPjj DROP TABLE #TEMPJ DROP TABLE #TempRecruitees set nocount o.
